description: Process raised to purchase 429-0451S MAST POLE under the Supply Arrangement.
full_summary:
==================

### Government Tender Announcement

#### Aircraft Mast Pole Purchase

**Tender Title:** 429-040-040-105S AIRCRAFT MAST POLE

**Reference Number:** WS4110150466-Doc4110299946

**Amendment Number:** 4
**Solicitation Number:** WS4110150466

**Publication Date:** August 8, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** September 15, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) under a Supply Arrangement

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional

**Description:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for the purchase of Aircraft Mast Poles, in accordance with the attached solicitation documents.

**Selection Criteria:** The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements:** This tender complies with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Delivery:** The delivery of the products is required in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.

**Contracting Entity:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Edmond Egikian
* Email: edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: Not provided

**Tender Description:** The PSPC invites vendors to provide quotations for the purchase of Aircraft Mast Poles, in accordance with the requirements outlined in the solicitation documents.

**Reply Instructions:** Interested vendors must submit their proposals electronically through the WCS system, in accordance with the submission instructions outlined in the solicitation documents.

**Deadline for Questions:** September 11, 2023

**Disclaimer:** The PSPC reserves the right to reject any or all proposals, and to request clarification or additional information at any time during the evaluation process.

Please note the deadline for proposals is September 15, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time). Responses must be submitted electronically through the WCS system, following the guidelines outlined in the solicitation documents. If you have any questions, please direct them to the contact person at the address below. Please note that the PSPC reserves the right to reject any or all proposals, or request information during the evaluation process.
